website_summaries.verdict: Final Fantasy XIV is one of the best MMORPGs on the market, and is easily one of the best Final Fantasy games in the series. It's packed with content, including an engaging narrative and quirky quests that are an absolute delight.
pros: Rich, highly developed gameplay systems enable varied play styles
Plenty of end-game and optional content
cons: Can be grind-heavy at times, forcing you to earn levels to progress through the story

customer_reviews.title: Missing an Expansion
customer_reviews.text: This is an old version of the complete edition which contains every expansion except Shadowbringers, which is the newest. Unfortunately, even with the large sale price, it is a much better deal to get the full priced complete edition directly from square enix than it is to buy this and the Shadowbringers separately. Stay away.
customer_reviews.author: Alex C.

customer_reviews.title: Must have friends to play with
customer_reviews.text: Honestly like most MMORPG you have to have a good group of people to play with. Those that will aid you in progressing and becoming a better player. That will guide you through the game while not spoiling anything. It does cost $15 a month (which is a small turn off for me.) but it is worth it when I have a group of friends and we are running roughshod on primals
customer_reviews.author: Mike Forsythe

customer_reviews.title: LOVE this game!
customer_reviews.text: I am extremely happy that my friends convinced me to purchase FFXIV. I adore everything about it in summary and have been playing it every month since my purchase. I feel it is very much so worth the money and I am provided with hours of entertainment and fun. Try it out if you like fantasy style MMORPGs!
customer_reviews.author: Carol L Garrison

customer_reviews.title: Way to go
customer_reviews.text: Well worth the money if you a newcomer. Include everything and a free month subscription
customer_reviews.author: Tony

customer_reviews.title: Tangible product!
customer_reviews.text: The game enclosed in this case saved me at least 3 days of DSL download with my terrible internet connection. Great game!
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Haddad

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: A fun game where you will never run out of stuff to do
customer_reviews.author: A person.

customer_reviews.title: Great work
customer_reviews.text: My sister love this game and she was happy that she got it in time and that she can't stop playing at all.g
customer_reviews.author: RAE

customer_reviews.title: Gift for dad.
customer_reviews.text: He plays with his friends every weekend. And since he retired mom loves it when hes too busy in game to “help out” ;)
customer_reviews.author: Tamberlin

customer_reviews.title: Amazing mmorpg, great graphics and an entertaining story
customer_reviews.text: Amazing mmorpg, great graphics and an entertaining story. Monthly subscription is only negative, but there is always fresh new content so it is worth monthly fee.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Stewart

customer_reviews.title: just one thing
customer_reviews.text: Great experience. got my game as ordered. thank you ^^
customer_reviews.author: Alejandro Blanco

customer_reviews.title: Loads of fun!
customer_reviews.text: Find a free company (guild). I guarantee it will make the experience much better (I used to play MMOs solo and it got old real fast).
customer_reviews.author: Misha

customer_reviews.title: Great MMORPG
customer_reviews.text: Seems to take forever to install... but once loaded it runs great. I loved FFXI and only wish that they had kept some of the more difficult/challenging aspects of the game. In a world as complex as this... you shouldn't be able to solo as much as you can
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: OK game, good graphics, unfortunately many people who make the game less than fun to play.
customer_reviews.text: Good game but requires you to join groups to complete missions and many of the people who play make it less than enjoyable.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Pires

customer_reviews.title: great population. I only wish I could use arcanist ...
customer_reviews.text: IF ONLY... gorgeous characters, lots of stuff to do - challenging dungeons, great population. I only wish I could use arcanist skills while moving... talk about quibble... GORGEOUS characters... tons of fun
customer_reviews.author: Richard Owens

customer_reviews.title: Good product; mediocre game for FFXI fans.
customer_reviews.text: The product was as described. Don't buy this game thinking it'll be anything comparable to FFXI. There's no challenge to it and it gets boring fast.
customer_reviews.author: Michael William DeBlasio

customer_reviews.title: Please
customer_reviews.text: I can be able for sent to you, BACK. Because the one I want is for PS4
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Play a game with better customer service!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this game months ago and I’ve still haven’t been able to play it on my PC. The customer service is beyond horrible and I can’t get anyone on the phone. I loved this game on the ps4 but I didn’t play for over a year and now I can’t get customer service to help me log back on. I’ve never had such a horrible experience with customer service before!
customer_reviews.author: SW social worker

customer_reviews.title: False images
customer_reviews.text: Product images don't match actual game-play as they are a pre-rendered animated trailer for the game. While Graphics aren't bad its definitely false advertising wont be changing this review until the page is made honest. That being said the in-game graphics aren't bad just not up to par at all with the pre-rendered animation. They rarely upgrade graphics and don't give pc users enough control. That being said they do update content alot, and try to balance though this can end badly or in favor of your favorite class. They have completely overhauled some classes and just removed countless abilities which while it may have helped streamline they for a few classes like WHM was unfair.
customer_reviews.author: Jon M

product_meta.title: Final Fantasy XIV Online - Complete for PC
product_meta.description: Platform:PC| Edition:Complete EditionTake part in an epic and ever-changing FINAL FANTASY as you adventure and explore with friends from around the world. The complete edition is perfect for newcomers as it includes the award-winning FINAL FANTASY XIV: A Realm Reborn and the Heavensward and Stormblood expansion packs! Join others from around the world and start your own FINAL FANTASY adventure today!
feature_bullets: Features a vibrant cast of characters, hundreds of quests, and exciting locales to explore
Experience all of the jobs/classes on a single character
